## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |

|  [close](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icustomclusterclient.close.md) | <code>() =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;</code> | Closes the cluster client. After that client cannot be used and one should create a new client instance to be able to interact with OpenSearch API. |
